text: Uzelek's rhythmic chants inspire loyalty and determination in the mighty Yusak's as much as they strike fear in those who oppose him.
The tempo of Uzelek's drumming increases, driving his allies into a state of furious combat prowess, enhancing their critical hit chance.
His presence on the battlefield bolsters the resilience of nearby allies, granting them increased defense against enemy attacks.
The chaotic rhythms of the Soulshaker disorient enemies, causing them to suffer penalties to accuracy and coordination.
He sets a relentless marching pace for his allies, increasing their movement range on the campaign map.
Zar Uzulek beats a defiant rhythm on his drum, granting nearby allies increased combat effectiveness and resilience as they make their final stand against overwhelming odds.
Uzelek unleashes a booming rallying cry, rallying wavering allies and restoring their morale.
The Zar's drumming disrupts the flow of magic, causing enemy spellcasters to struggle to maintain their spells.

Zar Uzulek channels the dark energy of his enchanted hammer, unleashing a torrent of devastating strikes upon his foes, each blow resonating with chaotic power, rending armor and crushing bone with malevolent force
Enemies shrivel in awe and fear as the bellowing sounds of Uzelek's drum announce his imminent arrival.

Zar Uzelek's drum is known as the Soulshaker, a massive instrument crafted from the tanned hide of a great beast, adorned with chaotic symbols and etchings that seem to writhe and pulse with dark energy.The Soulshaker is a towering instrument, its surface scarred and weathered from countless battles. When Zar Uzulek strikes it, the sound reverberates across the battlefield like a rolling thunderstorm, instilling both dread and exhilaration in those who hear its primal call.
A drum that pounds like the heartbeat of a daemon, instilling frenzy and dread in equal measure.
This character invigorates nearby friendly troops with the sound of his bellowing drums - which additionally frighten enemies.
Zar Uzulek's drum beats a cadence of rejuvenation, rallying nearby allies and infusing them with renewed vigor, both in body and spirit.
